{{disambig-more: '''''Moria''''' is a sourcebook for [[Decipher]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying Game]]''.

Boxed with maps, a 32-page book, and a 96-page book. Details the ancient realm of the dwarf-lords. An old-fashioned subterranean adventure with lots of twists, traps, and caverns. The fellowship will be tested at every turn as they journey through the twisted underground mazes of Moria.
